sentence.Network_en: Many streams have flooded their banks, making some roads impassable.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多小河的水已经漫过堤岸，造成一些道路不能通行。

sentence.Network_en: The mud made the roads impassable.
sentence.Network_cn: 道路因为泥泞而无法通行.

sentence.Network_en: In ancient mythology there was no impassable gulf separating the divine from the human beings.
sentence.Network_cn: 在上古神话中,神与人之间没有不可逾越的鸿沟.

entry.tran: 不能通行的;无法通过的
entry.def: If a road, path, or route is impassable, it is impossible to travel over because it is blocked or in bad condition.

auth_sentence.content: Many roads are impassable in southern and central Somalia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many roads are impassable in southern and central Somalia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many roads are impassable in southern and central Somalia.

auth_sentence.content: Now, most of the paths were choked and impassable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now, most of the paths were choked and impassable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, most of the paths were choked and impassable.

auth_sentence.content: Most of the roads were completely impassable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of the roads were completely impassable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of the roads were completely impassable.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =pass through,表示"步,通过"; 2. =feeling,表示"感情"; 3. = 表示"忍耐,遭受"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能通行的,无路可通的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impasse[n.僵局,死路]+able能……的→adj.不能通行的,无路可通的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 慷慨激昂的,充满激情的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+passion激情+ed有……的→有激情的
pass感情+ive……的→感情用事→被动的
com共同+pass步,通过→共同能过的地方→做事的范围
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+age总称→n.通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
pass步,通过+enger人→通过的人→乘客

stems_affixes.value_cn: 护照,达到某种目的的手段
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+port港口→通过港口的凭证
com共同+passion感情→有共同的感情→同情

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass感情+ion表名词→n.热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

sentences.en: The mud made the roads impassable.
sentences.cn: 道路因为泥泞而无法通行。

sentences.en: There was an impassable barrier between the white race and the one which they had reduced to slavery.
sentences.cn: 在白色人种和被他们奴役的种族之间有一道不可逾越的障碍。
